scene_description_enriched: A king, seated on a throne and wearing a crown and ermine-trimmed robe, gestures with a scepter towards a kneeling figure. The kneeling figure, clad in armor and a red tunic, holds a helmet. Behind the kneeling figure, several soldiers with helmets and spears stand at attention. The scene is set within an interior space, suggested by the presence of a throne and a draped canopy.
scene_interpretation: This scene likely depicts a moment of judgment or audience with a monarch, possibly illustrating a biblical or historical narrative where a ruler receives a supplicant or a warrior.
